jd: From: Praveen Kumar, Magicforce praveen@magicforce.us Reply to: praveen@magicforce.us Job Title: Epic Operational Database Administrator (ODBA),Location: RemoteDuration: 1+ YearJob Description:•Overall 12+ of IT experience; at least 5 years in Healthcare IT.•At least 4+ years of EPIC Operational Database Administrator (ODBA) experience delivering projects or program enhancements within a healthcare organization or healthcare consulting or managed services practice.•EPIC ODBA certification is mandatory.•Experience with at least two or more Epic implementations or upgrades.•Proficiency with Linux, AIX or UNIX operating systems•Comfortable with working remotely and/or traveling to client sites.•Able to work successfully with moderate supervision and latitude for independent judgement. Key responsibilities (but not limited to):•Participating in cross-functional efforts to resolve technical issues, chronic problems, and technology integration challenges through the enterprise.•Responsible for the installation, administration, config, maintenance, and monitoring of the Epic environments.•Additionally, responsible for database management including design, implementation, maintenance, monitoring, etc.,•Documentation and change management procedures including testing, ensure the systems integrity during enhancements/upgrades.•Capable to understand and extract data from EPIC clarity tables.•Able to understand EPIC clarity tables/attributes and associated data dictionaries, EPIC community specs and guide to define the functional specifications.•Contributing to team objectives and outcomes
